summary: This bill, the Prevent Government Shutdowns Act of 2025, aims to prevent government shutdowns by establishing automatic continuing appropriations in the event of a lapse in appropriations. It outlines procedures, consequences for failing to enact appropriations, and limits on official travel. The bill also includes provisions for expedited congressional review of anomalies and clarifies budgetary effects related to discretionary spending. It takes effect on September 30, 2025.
